description: Like you, the XA COLLIDER 2 GTX loves to run in the great outdoors, exploring new places and sensations. This season, they've upped the protection with a reinforced push-bumper toe cap, without compromising on comfort, versatility or GORE-TEX waterproofness. Made for tough conditions in rugged terrain or around town.
name: Salomon XA Collider 2 GTX - Mens
